title: Parsing URLs in Go
description: The purpose of this lab is to demonstrate how to parse URLs in Go.

meta.title: Go | URL Parsing | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to parse URLs in Go programming language. Explore the different components of a URL and how to extract them using the url and net packages.
meta.keywords: Go, URL Parsing, Programming Tutorials, URL Components, Scheme, Authentication, Host, Port, Path, Query Parameters, Query Fragment
